entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Running an iOS app using the command 'sudo dotnet build -t:Run -f net8.0-ios' gets stuck #20280
  • ThumbColor and OnColor property is not applied for switch #20278
  • Unable to customize the Datepicker calendar, TImepicker view and picker drop down view #20277
  • Unable to change the border color for the DatePicker, Timepicker and Picker #20276
  • Re-Enabled for iOS ViewWithMarginSetsFrameAndDesiredSizeCorrectly[SearchBar] #20275
  • IsEnabled=False on .NET MAUI ShellContent and CollectionView not working on iOS (still enabled) #20274
  • Previously selected Shellitem cannot be reselected #20273
  • Bug in VS 17.8.3 - MAUI - for windows .net8.0 #20272
  • Pages not appearing in .NET MAUI app #20271
  • Unable to change the border color for the entry and editor #20270
  • Applink makes app hang after using back button in Android with MAUI 8 #20267
  • [X] Compile bindings with explicit (non-relative) source #20266
  • App Icon doesn't appear in window title bar #20265
  • Android does not update visibility of a visual element if it has a Shadow #20264
  • Compatibility AbsoluteLayout is broken on Android #20262
  • ListView + DataTemplateSelector + HasUnevenRows issue on iOS #20261
  • The keyboard hides the Entry when the IsPassword property is set to true on iOS. #20259

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview1] Update versions #20279
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Add visual test support for multiple devices for a single platform #20256

Updated

  • Implemented ios:Slider.UpdateOnTap #20124
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • [iOS] Add iOS17 tests again #19941
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/testing
  • Fix text toolbar item icon not removed when navigating on Android #16796
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, stale, area/toolbar, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Only return path to font file if it exists, otherwise copy it again. Fixes #16923 #16924
    platform/android 🤖, area/fonts 🅰️, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • Android Ecosystem updates - AndroidX #17318
    platform/android 🤖, stale, area/platform
  • - [Android] Fix ShouldShowToolbarButton for FlyoutPage #18522
    platform/android 🤖, area/FlyoutPage, community ✨, stale
  • fix - 12469 - android refreshview isrefreshing binding #18273
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, stale
  • Add Android 14.0 or API 34 to the test matrix #18721
    platform/android 🤖, area/infrastructure 🏗️, stale
  • Fix TableView rendering on Android #19473
    area/layout 🔲, platform/android 🤖, community ✨
  • Fixed line break mode for buttons #20133
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨
  • Account for margins on sizes returned from Editor #20249
    area/controls 🎮, control-editor
  • Generalize HideSoftInputOnTapped on Android and iOS to support 3rd party input controls #19626
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area/keyboard
  • Fix connectivity broadcast receiver never triggered on android 14.0/34+ #19968
    platform/android 🤖, area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • iOS Next Entry to skip hidden parents #20160
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/a11y, control-entry, area/keyboard
  • iOS Keyboard Scrolling - Maui Community Toolkit Popup #19765
    platform/iOS 🍎, control-entry, area/keyboard
  • Fixed entry text color [iOS] #20100
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-entry
  • Ignore ScrollRectToVisible if KeyboardAutoManagerScroll is enabled in ItemsViewController #19875
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • Hide FlyoutIcon when FlyoutBehavior set to disabled #20087
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • Draw Line using BackgroundColor #17376
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, .NET 8 SR3
  • [Trimming] Fix trimming warnings related to image source service provider #20058
    area/app-size 🤏
  • [Trimming] Allow creating TypedBinding from expressions #19995
    area/app-size 🤏
  • Applying global styles to shadows #20203
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨
  • [Trimming] Add a feature flag to disable XAML loading at runtime #19310
    area/publishing 🏁, stale
  • [.NET 9] Reconcile all NET8 //TODO Add this API comments #19996
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/architecture
  • Add new Keyboards for Prompt #20194
    community ✨, area/keyboard
  • PullToRefresh & item selection when listView is not Enabled fix [iOS] #20102
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, area/ListView
  • set the parents to installer #18086
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, community ✨, stale
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19848
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
